ai-tha-ap280:3.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
ai-tha-ap280:3.2_0: whatever fruit he enjoyed the fruit,
ai-tha-ap280:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap280:3.4_0: This is the fruit of reed.
ai-tha-ap280:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap280:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Āḷavikā.
ai-tha-ap280:6.1_0: the eighth part of the senior monks with cleared clouds.
